Salita Parirala
Kumusta, Ano ang nais mong matutunan\nngayong araw? Tuklasin ang iba\'t ibang salita na maaari mong matutunan Panoorin ang iba\'t ibang ekspresyon ng mga parirala sa FSL Bawat salita ay mahalaga! Maaaring i-save ang mga salitang iyong ginagamit Wala ka pang paborito? Tumuklas na ng salita at idadag rito!

CvSU MISYON CvSU BISYON Misyon Cavite State University shall provide excellent, equitable and relevant educational opportunities in the arts, sciences and technology through quality instruction and responsive research and development activities. It shall produce professional, skilled and morally upright individuals for global competitiveness. Bisyon The premier university in historic Cavite recognized for excellence in the development of globally competitive and morally upright individuals
